ti:edition.ti:label: Trachiniae
ti:edition.ti:description: Sophocles, creator; Sophocles with an English translation Vol 2; Storr, Francis, 1839-1919, editor, translator; London, New York: William Heinemann Ltd., The Macmillan Company, 1913.

ti:translation.ti:label: Trachiniae
ti:translation.ti:description: Sophocles, creator; Sophocles the plays and fragments with critical notes, commentary, and translation in English prose, Part 5 The Trachiniae; Jebb, Richard Claverhouse, Sir, 1841-1905, editor, translator; Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 1892.

ti:translation.ti:label: Trachiniae
ti:translation.ti:description: Sophocles, creator; The Women of Trachis and Philoctetes. A new translation in verse by Robert Torrance. Torrance, Robert M. (Robert Mitchell), editor, translator. Houghton Mifflin, 1966.
